entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow before morning. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
